hindernisse_umfahren(ArrayList<Rechteck>) - Method in class Spielfeld
The Method to let the Robot move and a void the Obstcals until he at the bottom right Edge or stick between 2 Obstacles Positive x values extend to the right, positive y values to the bottom Here will declare how the Robot will avoid obstacles until he reached the Edge of the Panels or stuck between 2 Obstacles he need not to search another way to go down
